contentrichtext.text: {{Selfref|In Wikipedia, AWB may refer to [[Wikipedia:AutoWikiBrowser|AutoWikiBrowser]].}} '''AWB''' may refer to: * [[Afrikaner Weerstandsbeweging]], an Afrikaner political group * [[Air waybill]], a receipt issued by an international courier company * [[Average White Band]], a Scottish funk and R&B band ** [[AWB (album)|''AWB'' (album)]], a 1974 album by Average White Band * [[Aviation without Borders]], an humanitarian aeronautical [[non-governmental organization]] * [[AWB Limited]], the former Australian Wheat Board, an Australian company that oversees the exports of grain * [[Federal Assault Weapons Ban]], a provision of a United States federal law * .awb, the common file extension for the [[AMR-WB]] speech coding standard * Auto white balance, a [[color balance]] feature of digital cameras and video cameras {{disambig}}
